solution_line_template: Since the shortest part is consists of {shortest_piece_ratio_parts} parts, then each part is equal to {shortest_piece_length} cm/{shortest_piece_ratio_parts} = <<{shortest_piece_length}/{shortest_piece_ratio_parts}={length_per_part}>>{length_per_part} cm.
The whole wire was cut into {ratio_part1} + {ratio_part2} + {ratio_part3} = <<{ratio_part1}+{ratio_part2}+{ratio_part3}={total_ratio_parts}>>{total_ratio_parts} parts.
Hence, the wire was {length_per_part} cm x {total_ratio_parts} = <<{length_per_part}*{total_ratio_parts}={entire_wire_length}>>{entire_wire_length} cm long
